divs: sighting detailsi was out infront of my house with my boyfriend a friend and my 11 year old son. my boyfriend went to the backyard and i heard him saying something but i was talking to my friend and didnt hear him until he came back. he said..there is something weird in the sky. i saw it. i thought it was the northstar but i saw the north star to the left of the object. it moved as fast as an airplane but seemed to move smoother. it turned from white to brown\red. it made no noise. it had no blinking. it disappeared when i blinked my eye. i wish i had a camera or video tape.
Summary: Looked like the north start but it moved.. it turned from white to dark brownred..disappeared very quickly
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There was one other sighting in San Jose on or around September 25th 2009
